content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0), dropping iron ore at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-14.0, -48.0), aligned to catch iron ore directly from the mining drill

### Additional Furnace at Position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entity:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0), currently not connected to any mining drill and has no ingredients to smelt

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities due to collision or unsuitable terrain
- Ensure there is enough space and the terrain is suitable before placing an entity. Consider increasing the spacing, changing the direction, or adjusting the reference position to avoid collisions with existing entities or unsuitable terrain like water.

### Errors when placing entities too far from the player
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place an entity. The maximum placement distance is 10 tiles, so ensure you are within this range.

### Errors when inserting items without sufficient inventory
- Verify that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity.
